parameters.name: userandom
parameters.description: if 1, uses a random order each time; if 0, uses single fixed order

parameters.name: horizontaloffset
parameters.description: Pixels from center line that the responses are placed

parameters.name: verticaloffset
parameters.description: Height of responses, below centerline. Override for better control.

parameters.name: usevideofeedback
parameters.description: Whether video correct/error feedback should be given

parameters.name: useaudiofeedbackalways
parameters.description: Whether audio feedback should always be given

parameters.name: useaudiofeedbackpractice
parameters.description: Whether audio feedback should be given during practice

parameters.name: responsemode
parameters.description: Response input mode: keyboardShift (LEFT-SHIFT/RIGHT-SHIFT), keyboardSafe (Z/slash), mousebutton (clicks), mousetarget (clickable targets), touchtarget (touch optimized)

parameters.name: usemouse
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: Use responsemode parameter instead. Use mouse/touch input (1) versus keyboard (0)
